original_title: LEGO DC Super Hero Girls: Brain Drain
overview: When Supergirl, Wonder Woman, Batgirl, Bumblebee and Katana suddenly realize they cannot remember a single moment from their Monday at Super Hero High, the young DC Super Heroes spring into sleuthing action! Suspecting foul-play, they band together to retrace their steps and uncover the mystery of who exactly stole their memories â€“ and what nefarious plan might be afoot?
title: LEGO DC Super Hero Girls: Brain Drain
